remarks: Property defining a continuous functional.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
elcnfn $p |- ( T e. ConFn <-> ( T : ~H --> CC /\ A. x e. ~H A. y e. RR+ E. z e. RR+ A. w e. ~H ( ( normh ` ( w -h x ) ) < z -> ( abs ` ( ( T ` w ) - ( T ` x ) ) ) < y ) ) ) $.
$d T w x y z $.
